"Point to the map?" said quietly, thinking to himself as Windlord 
spoke with the caveman.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "It's very kind of you, my friend"replied Windlord
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> > The caveman walked up to Windlord. "I..ca..." HIs voice was 
> getting staticy, 
> > "Poi...to ma..."
